title: 论坛下载的MC1.4.7绿色纯净版无法启动crashed.
author: 63Abdiel
txt_content:
本帖最后由 63Abdiel 于 2013-2-3 20:03 编辑 

1、已装JAVA

2、未装任何MOD

3、使用MCSP登陆器，JAR、EXE均Crashed..................



      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-03_19.55.23-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 8da507f1 --------

C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-03_19.55.23-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

replies.author: 63Abdiel
replies.txt_content: 哈哈！ 我自己解决啦！！更新了显卡的驱动到最新！！！
